00029 #ifndef GENERALPLANESTIMULUSCELLFACTORY_HPP_
00030 #define GENERALPLANESTIMULUSCELLFACTORY_HPP_
00031 
00032 #include "PlaneStimulusCellFactory.hpp"
00033 
00041 template <class CELL, unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM = ELEMENT_DIM>
00042 class GeneralPlaneStimulusCellFactory : public PlaneStimulusCellFactory<CELL,ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>
00043 {
00044 
00045 public:
00061     GeneralPlaneStimulusCellFactory(unsigned numEleAcross, double meshWidth, bool useMeshWidthAsMag=false, double stimulusMagnitude=-1e7, double stimulusDuration=0.5)
00062         : PlaneStimulusCellFactory<CELL,ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>(stimulusMagnitude,stimulusDuration) // These values are overridden below anyway.
00063     {
00064         if (useMeshWidthAsMag)
00065         {
00066             #define COVERAGE_IGNORE
00067             this->mpStimulus.reset(new SimpleStimulus(meshWidth, 0.5));
00068             #undef COVERAGE_IGNORE
00069         }
00070         else
00071         {
00072             stimulusMagnitude*=numEleAcross/(64.0);
00073             // ELEMENT_DIM==1 Justification: elements go half size with each refinement
00074             // ELEMENT_DIM==2 Justification: Triangles go quarter size with each refinement, but there are twice as many nodes on boundary
00075             // ELEMENT_DIM==3 Hypothesis: Triangles go eighth size with each refinement, but there are four-times as many nodes on boundary
00076             stimulusMagnitude*=meshWidth/(0.2);
00077 
00078             //std::cout<<"Mag is "<<stimulusMagnitude<<"\n";
00079             this->mpStimulus.reset(new SimpleStimulus(stimulusMagnitude, stimulusDuration));
00080             LOG(1, "Defined a GeneralPlaneStimulusCellFactory<"<<SPACE_DIM<<"> with SimpleStimulus("<<stimulusMagnitude<<","<< stimulusDuration<< ")\n");
00081         }
00082     }
00083 
00084 };
00085 
00086 #endif /*GENERALPLANESTIMULUSCELLFACTORY_HPP_*/
